undercapitalized.translation[0].definiti: if a business is undercapitalized, it has not been given enough money to operate effectively
undercapitalized.translation[1].definiti: if a company is undercapitalized, it has less capital than it needs in order to operate effectively and grow
If you set up a store and you’re undercapitalized, you’re going to go bust  (=bankrupt).
